summary: The diff shows implementation of REQ-17 (Header component update to display logo) but does not include evidence of REQ-16 (logo image generation). The Header component correctly displays a logo from the specified path with appropriate positioning and responsive sizing, but the actual logo image file is not present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a custom automotive-style clutch plate logo image depicting a clutch plate with a professional mechanical aesthetic that matches the warm, trustworthy color palette of the site
missing_requirements.reason: No logo image file was added to frontend/public/assets/generated/clutch-logo.dim_120x120.png. The diff shows 0 added files, and the logo file does not appear in the ADDED FILES section.
